Initial commit: Triive Distribution Matrix Platform

- React/TypeScript app with Vite build system
- Supabase backend with authentication \(sign-in, sign-up, sign-out\)
- Distribution matrix visualization for client-retailer relationships
- Client and retailer management \(CRUD operations\)
- Activity feed with real-time updates
- Offline mode support with fallback data
- Tailwind CSS styling with Radix UI components

Update sample data to be generic

- Replace business-specific client names with generic placeholders
- Replace specific retailer names with generic "Retailer 1-4"
- Simplify distribution relationships for demo purposes
- Affects both frontend fallback data and backend initialization
